info.title: Latitude Health API Document
info.description: Latitude Health standard backend application API document.

get.description: The API authenticate User profile to return users info, its roles, role based permissions and global client app permissions.
get.summary: User profile api to return users info, its roles, role based permissions and global client app permissions.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a policy document by policy_id.
get.summary: Retrieve Tenant Document

parameters.name: unique_policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the policy

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a tenant document by policy_id.

parameters.name: unique_policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the policy

post.description: Export generated Review, Request & Clinical Summary in downlodable FHIR API format or PDF
post.summary: Export generated Review, Request & Clinical Summary

get.description: Healthcheck API: This endpoint allows to check application health
get.summary: Get API for latitude application healthcheck

get.description: This endpoint retrieves hierarchy data associated with a tenant from an external API.
get.summary: Retrieve Hierarchy Data from External API

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all tenant documents by org_hierarchy_ids. Use the same API to get unassigned docs by sending an empty org_hierarchy_ids. To retrieve all documents irrespective of hierarchy IDs, set all_docs to true.
get.summary: Retrieve Tenant Documents by org_hierarchy_ids

parameters.name: all_docs
parameters.description: Set to true to retrieve all documents irrespective of hierarchy IDs

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by doc_type, policy_name, status, policy_id

get.description: This endpoint retrieves hierarchy kpi data associated with a organizational hierarchy.
get.summary: Retrieve Organizational Hierarchy KPI by org_hierarchy_id

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all users by org_hierarchy_id with pagination and search functionality.
get.summary: Retrieve Users by org_hierarchy_id

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by  id, username, first_name, last_name, email, is_active, full_name, provider

post.description: API to associate users with multiple organization hierarchies.

items.description: List of user IDs to be associated with the organization hierarchy

post.description: This API allows you to do smart search on the EMR and policy guideline for the given request_id

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Id of temporary policy uploaded by user

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: Boolean flag indicating if a question is being asked

query.example: tell me what information is available in the given document from Past Medical History and HPI, Imaging and Lab Results, Procedures and Treatments, Related Claims and Authorizations

get.description:
This API endpoint allows retrying specific summarization tasks that have failed during the previous attempt. 
        If any task fails during the summarization process initiated by the 'upload_summarize_track' API, the failed tasks 
        are included in the response of that API along with the successful results. 
        You can retry those specific failed tasks using this API by providing the task ID and the summary type associated with the failed task.
get.summary: Retry specific failed task

parameters.name: summary_type
parameters.description: The type of summarization task to retry. This should match the summary type of the failed task.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the failed task to retry.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the review summary based on the clinical summary and plan guidelines.
get.summary: Get review summary

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Id of temporary policy uploaded by user

post.description: This endpoint will be used to generate the embeddings of the plan policy documents

put.description: This endpoint updates a tenant document by uuid.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the tenant document

get.description:
This API provides continuous progress updates on the extraction process. 
        When the extraction process is complete, it will return the summarization as the result. 
        It takes the task ID which is provided under post call of 'upload_summarize_track' API.
get.summary: Fetch summarization progress and its response using task id

post.description:
This API allows you to upload multiple PDF/FHIR format medical-record/EMR files. 
                    and it will provide you with the ID of the task which includes uploading text extraction and summarization.
                    This task will run at backend and you can track this task using provided ID used as param in this endpoint upload_summarize_track
post.summary: Upload PDF/FHIR format medical-record/EMR files and generate summarization

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all users with the SYSTEM_ADMIN role.
get.summary: Retrieve System Admin Users

post.description: This endpoint allows users to add a new user by providing necessary data.
post.summary: Public API to Add a new user

put.description: This endpoint Send invitation email to client admin once infra creation is done.
put.summary: Send invitation email to client admin once infra creation is done

post.description: This endpoint allows to maintain user last activity timestamp or user audit
post.summary: Save last activity information in User audit

put.description: This endpoint allows users to logout by invalidating the access token.

post.description: This endpoint allows Sign In by Microsoft login validator based on access_token
post.summary: Microsoft login validator based on access_token

post.summary: Update role master's Baseline review time

put.description: This endpoint allows to Save/Update features against the role

This endpoint put method to activate/deactivate user one at a time

get.description: GET request to permit user, At a time of login validate an invite which was sent over email.
get.summary: GET request to validate an invite.

post.description: This endpoint returns a list of EDI278 records with pagination, filters, and sorting.

items.description: Date or date range in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD

due_date.description: List of dates or date ranges for filtering records

search.description: Search records by request ID, member name, provider name, or code

order_by.description: Field to order by (request_id, member_name, due_date, status)

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve a specific EDI278 record.
get.summary: Retrieve an EDI278 record

put.description: This endpoint allows users to update a specific EDI278 record.

delete.description: This endpoint allows users to delete a specific EDI278 record.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to create a new EDI278 record or inbound FHIR request by uploading data PA authorisation in pdf/json format
post.summary: Create a new EDI278 record or inbound FHIR request.

put.description: This endpoint allows users to update specific fields of an EDI278 record.

delete.description: This endpoint allows users to delete an EDI record by providing necessary data.

post.description: This endpoint allows users to create a new ICD code by providing necessary data.

get.description: This endpoint will be used to get the summary of the plan guidelines of a specified EDI request.
get.summary: Plan guideline summary for EDI request

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Id of temporary policy uploaded by user

get.description: This endpoint will be used to get the stats of the requests
get.summary: Provides stats of EDI requests like total, inprogress, due today and expedited requests.

get.description: Returns the average review time per case for roles like NURSE and MD over the current year, broken down by month.
get.summary: Retrieve Task Performance Dashboard Data

get.summary: Fetch the user by role

post.description: This endpoint allows to Import Users[allowed files:- .csv or .xlsx] in Entra ID & DB. Action is restricted and only Client Admin can perform it.
post.summary: Import Users[allowed files:- .csv or .xlsx] in Entra ID & DB. Action is restricted and only Client Admin can perform it.

StatusE59Enum.description:
* `NEW` - New
* `IN-PROGRESS` - In-Progress
* `HOLD` - On Hold
* `APPROVED` - Approved
* `REJECTED` - Rejected
